for _ in range(int(input())):
    s = input()
    val = s.count('1')
    res = 'WIN' if val % 2 != 0 else 'LOSE'
    print(res)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    s = input()
    val = s.count('1')
    res = 'WIN' if val % 2 != 0 else 'LOSE'
    print(res)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    s = input()
    val = s.count('1')
    res = 'WIN' if val % 2 != 0 else 'LOSE'
    print(res)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    s = input()
    print('WIN' if s.count('1') % 2 != 0 else 'LOSE')

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    s = input()
    print('LOSE') if s.count('1') % 2 == 0 else print('WIN')

for _ in range(int(input())):
    print('LOSE' if list(input().strip()).count('1') % 2 == 0 else 'WIN')
